findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations could leave parties vulnerable to claims without recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Without audit rights, the Receiving Party may not be able to verify compliance with confidentiality obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The three-year term may not be sufficient for ongoing relationships, potentially exposing confidential information after expiration.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.
